repl_description:
A full-stack web application enabling multi-user video communication and high-performance computing capabilities. The platform features room-based video chat functionality where multiple users can join, share video/audio, and interact simultaneously. The application includes a home page, interactive data tables with real-time GitHub user data updates, and WebAssembly components for enhanced performance.

Tech Stack:
• Frontend: React.js
• Backend: Node.js
• Real-time Communication: WebRTC
• Performance Enhancement: WebAssembly
• Data Visualization: Charts for user analytics
• Features: Multi-user video rooms, Real-time data tables with auto-refresh, Room-based communications
